name: The Hungry Games
description:
At Hungry School there is no time for games. When the lunch bell rings it's Stain or be Stained. Where will you be when the food fight starts.

Throw pizza slices and soda cans to knock out your school rivals. But be careful, some students are on your side and hitting them will only make them dislike you. 

Can you survive all the grade levels at Hungry School? There is only one way to find out.

FOOD FIGHT!
